document.full_text: spanish soccer giants barcelona and real madrid have overtaken baseball's new york yankees as the highest paid teams in global sport, according to the global sports salaries survey 2011.
document.title: barcelona, real overtake yankees as top wage payers
lines_and_colors: spanish soccer giants barcelona and real madrid have overtaken baseball's new york yankees as the highest paid teams in global sport, according to the global sports salaries survey 2011.
